description: A [Threat Group-3390](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0027) tool can add the binary’s path to the Registry key Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run to add persistence.(Citation: Nccgroup Emissary Panda May 2018)

external_references.description: Pantazopoulos, N., Henry T. (2018, May 18). Emissary Panda – A potential new malicious tool. Retrieved June 25, 2018.
